creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: standing young woman wearing a blouse, skirt, shawl and hat, with a bundle in a striped blanket strapped to her back; mounted on board
dimension: 19 1/2 x 15 5/8 in. (49.53 x 39.69 cm) (image, sheet, mount)
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [(Chulumani, Bolivia) / Campesina]
title: Campesina, Chulumani, Bolivia
